pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Chillax includes several systems:
chillax.asd - This is a 'DWIM' system. It includes the Yason server for parsing/encoding JSON data. It also defines a single #:chillax package that includes the symbols in both #:chillax.core and #:chillax.yason. If you don't know what you want, this is probably what you want. chillax.core.asd - Core API and protocols for servers, databases, documents, and design-docs. chillax.yason.asd - Implementation of the server protocol using Yason's JSON parser. chillax.jsown.asd - Implementation of the server protocol using JSOWN's JSON parser. chillax.utils.asd - Some handy utilities. chillax.view-server.asd - The Chillax view server. This only depends on chillax.utils.
